repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:20.04
MAINTAINER Matthew Mattox <matt.mattox@suse.com>

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -yq --no-install-recommends \
    apt-utils \
    curl \
    && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

## Install kubectl
RUN curl -f -kLO "https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/$( curl -f -ks https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/stable.txt)/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl" && \
chmod u+x kubectl && \
mv kubectl /usr/local/bin/kubectl

COPY *.sh /root/
RUN chmod +x /root/*.sh
CMD /root/run.sh
